feed.title: This looks Secure
feed.subtitle: In this blog you will find stuff about Linux, Embedded systems, security and guitars

entry.title: Hail Ghidra
entry.summary: Bypassing the login system on a binary Introduction As a student, one of the courses I enjoyed the most was one about understanding the deep structure and workflow inside an operating system with the help of Modern Operating Systems book by Andrew Tanenbaum. The coding part was the most funny for me and my friends. In those coding labs the student tries to reveal hidden information in the ...
